summary: Taddeu, a Sardinian outlaw, organizes fake kidnappings for the tourists who go for strong emotions. The police, however, are informed, step in, and a shootout begins.
cast: Sylva Koscina|Jean Sorel|Pamela Tiffin|Lou Castel|Luigi Pistilli|Maurizio Bonuglia|Giovanni Petrucci|Gabriele Ferzetti|Renato Romano|Massimo Sarchielli|Claudio Trionfi|Paola Corinti|Paolo Luciani
title: En la boca del lobo
